data.title: Venkatesh Expresses High Confidence on the success of 'Saindhav'
data.meta_description: Victory Venkatesh, the acclaimed actor of Telugu cinema, expressed his sentimental connection with Vizag during the pre-release event of his 75th film
data.text:
HYDERABAD: Victory Venkatesh, the acclaimed actor of Telugu cinema, expressed his sentimental connection with Vizag (Visakhapatnam) during the pre-release event of his 75th film, "Saindhav." The event took place in Vizag, and Venkatesh shared his happiness about having a strong bond with the city since his first film.

The veteran actor conveyed his joy about being part of an emotional film for his 75th project. Venkatesh reflected on his previous successful films, such as "Enemy," "Dharmachakram," and "Ganesh," expressing confidence that "Saindhav" would follow suit as a sure hit.

The director of the film, Shailesh Polana, praised Venkatesh's performance in "Saindhav," stating that the audience would witness a different side of the actor. He expressed gratitude for the opportunity to direct Venkatesh's 75th film, and the entire team worked passionately on the project.

The pre-release event in Vizag featured the film's crew, contributing to the excitement surrounding the release of "Saindhav." The film features Shraddha Srinath, Andrea, Arya, Jissu Sengupta, Mukesh Rushi, Nawazuddin Siddiqui and others in crucial roles. The team is extremely happy that the film is releasing during Sankranthi.

The movie will hit the screens on the 13th of this month.
